name: CBE Capital Investment Bank S.C.
short: Investment banking arm of Commercial Bank of Ethiopia focused on capital markets.
overview: CBE Capital provides underwriting, advisory, and capital markets services as Ethiopia builds its securities market.
aims: Support issuances, advise state-owned enterprises and facilitate listings on the Ethiopian Securities Exchange.

name: Ethio Fidelity Securities S.C.
short: Securities dealer preparing for trading membership with ESX.
overview: Ethio Fidelity will act as a securities dealer and trading member when ESX opens, facilitating market access.
aims: Market making and secondary market support.

name: HST Investment Advisors P.L.C.
short: Corporate investment advisory and asset management services.
overview: HST offers advisory services to institutional and private investors on capital market transactions.
aims: Grow the advisory ecosystem and help structure offerings for local investors.

name: Wegagen Capital Investment Bank S.C.
short: Investment bank focusing on corporate finance and capital markets.
overview: Wegagen Capital will provide underwriting and advisory for market entrants.
aims: Enable privatizations and corporate listings in Ethiopia.
